description: Single storey rear extension; raised terrace with privacy screens (following demolition of existing rear enclosure and associated patio)
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers: Proposed Floor Plans drawing no. PL05 Rev B, Proposed Front and Rear Elevations Plans drawing no. PL06A, Proposed Side Elevations Floor Plans drawing no. PL07A and Existing and Proposed Section drawing no. PL08A
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning
| All external materials to be used in the development shall be consistent with those listed within the submitted application form and the drawings / plans as listed in Condition (2).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 7.4 & 7B of the Development Management DPD (2013), policy D3 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 1.1 (g), 1.1 and 3.8 of the Adopted Core Strategy (2012).
| No part of the roof of the proposed extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason:  To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies D3 and D6 of The London Plan (2021), policy DAA of the Ealing local Plan (Reg.22), policy 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and policies 1.1 (k), 3.1 (b) and 3.8 Core Strategy (2012)
| The proposed flank window on the side elevation (facing no.540 Greenford Road) shall contain only obscure glass and only have top openings at a minimum of 1.7m from floor level.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties in accordance with policies D3 and D6 of the London Plan (2021), policies policy 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012). and policy DAA of Ealing Local Plan (Reg.22)
| The proposed privacy screens shall be obscure glazed and permanently retained as such.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties in accordance with policies D3 and D6 of the London Plan (2021), policies policy 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012). and policy DAA of Ealing Local Plan (Reg.22)
